sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux'; import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect'; import {selectCartItems, selectCartTotal} from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' import CheckOutItem from '../../components/checkout-item/checkout-item.component' import './checkout.styles.scss' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../../components/stripe-button/stripe-button.component' const CheckOutPage = ({cartItems, cartTotal, dispatch}) => (
Product
Description
Quantity
Price
Remove
{ cartItems.map( cartItem => ) }
TOTAL: ${cartTotal}
*Please use the following test credit card for payments*
424242 4242 4242 4242 - Exp: Any further date - CVV:123
) const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ cartItems : selectCartItems, cartTotal: selectCartTotal }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckOutPage)
